data.name: Senpai and the Mysterious Dungeon
data.detailed_description:
New Releases

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1731200
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1826160


About the Game

"Senpai and the Mysterious Dungeon" is a roguelike RPG developed by Ruhut Soft, and published by OTAKU Plan.

STORY

To save the kidnapped senpai and also the beloved one, Fulla decides to challenge the dungeon on the island inhabited by demons.
This is a traditional 2D roguelike RPG. Every time you enter the dungeon, the layout will change!
Use various skills and equipment to save your senpai!!

FEATURE

  • Roguelike RPG
  • Cute graphics
  • A lot of costumes[/list*]

data.short_description: To save the kidnapped senpai and also the beloved one, Fulla decides to challenge the dungeon on the island inhabited by demons. This is a traditional 2D roguelike RPG. Every time you enter the dungeon, the layout will change! Use various skills and equipment to save your senpai!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
